markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Natural Swimmer](/Feats.aspx?ID=2974) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 199 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[wave order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

Water flows around you, letting you cut through the waves as if born to it. You gain a swim Speed of 15 feet. If you already have a permanent swim Speed, swimming up or down isn't difficult terrain.
name: Natural Swimmer
